title: Keto Avocado Salad
instructions: In a large bowl, combine the avocados, cucumber, red onion, and cilantro.
Drizzle with olive oil and lime juice.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

title: Keto Buddha Bowl
instructions: In a bowl, layer the cauliflower rice, chicken, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and avocado.
Drizzle with tahini sauce and olive oil.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

title: Keto Salmon
instructions: Place the salmon fillets on a baking sheet.
Drizzle with olive oil and top with lemon slices, garlic, and dill.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the salmon is cooked through.
